string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_Guardian_Light_Fi_55_Al
string.body: Rukril;A huge magical creature protecting the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_SZ_All]. It is normally fused with [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_Guardian_Dark_Fi_55_Al], but separates from it when threatened.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_Guardian_Dark_Fi_55_Al
string.body: Ebonsoul;A huge magical creature protecting the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_SZ_All]. It is normally fused with [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_Guardian_Light_Fi_55_Al], but separates from it when threatened.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_Octaside_Kn_55_Al
string.body: Kaluva the Fourth Fragment;A gigantic Arachna in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_SZ_All] that has a fragment of the Tower of Aion embedded in its tail. It guards its eggs and traps anyone who approaches in a cocoon.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_TempestElemental_El_55_Al
string.body: Pazuzu;A beautiful spirit in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_SZ_All]. Aether seems to have changed its features significantly.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingE_Wi_55_Al
string.body: Yamennes;The guardian of the Artefact of Protection in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_SZ_All]. His obsession with the protection of this artefact has changed him, and any attempt at destroying the Huge Aether Fragment makes him furious. He may appear either as Yamennes Painflare or Yamennes Blingsight.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_FiNmd_Combine
string.body: Dayshade;A huge magical creature protecting the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_SZ_All]. It splits into [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_Guardian_Light_Fi_55_Al] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_Guardian_Dark_Fi_55_Al] when threatened.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDAbRe_Core_Artifact
string.body: Artefact of Protection;The source of immense power that sustains the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_SZ_All]. It affects every living creature there. Destroying the Huge Aether Fragment destabilizes it.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDAbRe_Core_ArtifactCore
string.body: Huge Aether Fragment;A huge piece of Aether that appears when the powerful guardians of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_SZ_All] are defeated. It is thought to affect the Artefact of Protection.

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDAbRe_Core_Seed
string.body: Orkanimum Fragment;A piece detached from the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_SilikaCannon_Ra_55_Ah] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_SZ_All]. It is said that life spawns from this fragment.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDElim_keynamed
string.body: Taloc's Tormentors;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElim_1F_Sheluk_KeyNM_52_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElim_1F_Clodworm_ItemNM_52_Ae], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElim_2F_Octaside_KeyNM_52_Ae], beings of great power dwelling inside Taloc.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_21277
string.body: Drakan Researcher;Drakan researchers in the Naduka Biolab. Refers to [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_W_C5_DrakanPr_Re_lab_55_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_C4_DrakanPr_lab_54_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDStation_Hugen_NM_58An
string.body: Weapon H;A creature designed by the Balaur. Incomplete, it waits for its masters in the Aturam Sky Fortress Warehouse Zone.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDStation_ShulackFlight_NM_58_An
string.body: Popuchin;A Shulack of the Kaichin Engineering League. Since the Balaur subjugated his tribe, he has served in the Dredgion Fabrication Zone of the Aturam Sky Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDStation_DrakanNinja_NM_58_An
string.body: Nastika;She captured the Aturam Sky Fortress and is located in the Power Chamber in the occupied area. She enjoys the trust of Commander Baranath and is guarding the new Surkana.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDStation_DrakanBoss_58Re2
string.body: Commander Baraha;He is located in the Aturam Sky Fortress Command Center and appears when you have killed a certain number of Drakans.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDStation_Q18309
string.body: Dredgion Generator Protector;A craftsman who manages the Dredgion Generator in the Aturam Sky Fortress, including [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_ShuLackFI_2_58n], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_ShuLackKN_2_58n], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_ShuLackRA_2_58n], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_ShuLackWI_2_58n], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_ShuLackPR_2_58n].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_ME_PART_L_10_01A
string.body: Iron Clamp;One of the essential parts needed for construction. These clamps are made at the Construction Bench after collecting [%dic:STR_DIC_I_metal_n_c_81j].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_QUEST_SKILL_MENUI_299b
string.body: Undin's Plush Chair;Your first special furniture piece to craft to prove you're an expert. Buy the design from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Lurine] and make Undin's Chair with a special, added element.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_QUEST_SKILL_MENUI_399B
string.body: Processed Fasimedes' Chair;The second furniture piece required to qualify as an expert. Buy the design from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Lurine] and make Fasimedes' Chair, adding one more special item for processing.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_QUEST_SKILL_MENUI_500
string.body: Eremitia's Plush Chair;An exceptionally beautiful chair obtained by buying a design from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Lurine] and making Eremitia's Chair with an added, special item.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ShulackShip_L_2F
string.body: Steel Rake Cabin[pl:"Cabins"];The middle decks of the Steel Rake, where you can find the Sea Song Tavern, Grogget's Safe and Mercenary Quarters. [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF3_ShulackShip_Solo_Entrance] will take you there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_ShulackShip_D_2F
string.body: Steel Rake Cabin;The middle decks of the Steel Rake, where you can find the Sea Song Tavern, Grogget's Safe and Mercenary Quarters. [%dic:STR_DIC_N_DF3_ShulackShip_Solo_Entrance] will take you there.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_junk_town_upgrade_rich_soil

string.name: STR_DIC_E_junk_town_upgrade_rich_soil_d
string.body: Sacred fertile Earth;You will receive it if you destroy the Umbronites in Pernon.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_junk_town_upgrade_seasonlight
string.body: Light of the Seasons;You will receive this if you defeat the Spring Agrint. the Summer Agrint, the Autumn Agrint and the Winter Agrint. It contains the Power of the Seasons.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_junk_town_upgrade_flower_soul
string.body: Floral Soul;Soulstone holding the pure innonce of flowers. You can obtain it from a coloured flower pot once the village has reached leavel 4.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_Town_shugo_Worker_05

string.body: Heights of the Abyss;Can be accessed via the teleporter in Teminon once your own faction has occupied the stronghold. If not, you can teleport via the Stem.

string.name: DC1_Monster_Helion_Q2900
string.body: Hellion;The Elyos of destiny and your nemesis according to Skuld's visions. He is the one who will change the course of Elysea's destiny, but yet nothing is truly known about him.

string.name: STR_DIC_Xmasevent_001
string.body: Solorius;A grand festival first initiated by Solorius, the Daeva of Marriage. The Solorius festival occured during the Festival of the Twelve, and was meant to help people find love.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAb1_MiniCastle

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_001
string.body: Operation Policy;Refers to the rules that the company has implemented to respond with consistency to any problems that may occur while the company operates Aion. It is also a promise between the company and its customers to create a more stable and efficient game environment.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_002
string.body: Fraudulent Item;It is impossible to restore the items that you have obtained for free or in any inappropriate way through actions that violate the [%dic:STR_DIC_Notes_001].

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_003
string.body: Chatting Restriction;If you repeatedly spam, curse or swear on the chat window, you may be warned or be forbidden to chat according to the [%dic:STR_DIC_Notes_001].

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_004
string.body: In-game Support;You can ask the [%dic:STR_DIC_Notes_013]s for help when you face a serious trouble during game play and cannot handle it on your own. You can submit a petition from 13:00 pm to 05:00 am of the next day.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_005
string.body: Homepage Support;For more information about services, game play or troubleshooting, please submit your petition to the Customer Support Centre on the [%dic:STR_DIC_Notes_011]. You can use this service when you need to attach a screenshot or when you have a relevant question.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_006
string.body: Game Guide;The encyclopedia of Aion. The company regularly updates and summarizes ever-changing Aion information for customers.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_007
string.body: AION;For the latest Aion news, visit aionfreetoplay.com.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_008
string.body: FAQ;Frequently asked questions regarding Aion.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_009
string.body: Account Theft;Please write to the [%dic:STR_DIC_Notes_010] immediately if anyone has misused your account.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_010
string.body: Account Theft Report Centre;You can report any instance of [%dic:STR_DIC_Notes_009] to the Customer Report Centre on the [%dic:STR_DIC_Notes_011].

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_011
string.body: Official Homepage;You can find all games that Gameforge provides. The homepage address is http://www.gameforge.com

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_012
string.body: Official Base;A club community service, which divides into the game base and the social base.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_013
string.body: GM;GMs or Game Masters will be always ready to assist customers. They will take care of all troubles you may encounter during the gameplay as soon as possible.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_014
string.body: Cargo/Award System;The In-game Cargo System delivers gifts and messages to celebrate certain occasions and to award the best reporters and event winners.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_015
string.body: CM;The CM or Community Manager talks with customers on the free bulletin board of the homepage and implements changes into the game.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_016
string.body: Tazz;Aion bulletin board manager ([%dic:STR_DIC_Notes_015]), who first started to work online on January 29, 2007. He may be the closest person to the customers. Tazz writes his field experience report every week and serves as a bridge between the Aion Team and its customers.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_017
string.body: Personal Authentication;A process to authenticate your identity through your cellular phone or public authentication.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_018
string.body: Public authentication;A certificate that you can obtain from a financial institute if you pay a certain fee and follow the specified procedure.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_019
string.body: Fee System;

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_020
string.body: Game Agreement;A process by which you agree to the Service Terms before you start playing the game. You cannot play the game if you do not agree to the terms.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_021
string.body: Register Coupon;

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_022
string.body: Additional Service;Services that you can use after the [%dic:STR_DIC_Notes_017] process, including gender change and server transfer.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_023
string.body: Toll;A means of payment equivalent to cash on the Internet. You can use it to buy paid items or paid services of the game services that the company currently operates.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_024
string.body: Unacceptable User;A user who has violated the [%dic:STR_DIC_Notes_001] in or out of the game by engaging in [%dic:STR_DIC_Notes_025] or committing [%dic:STR_DIC_Notes_026]. If you are classified as an acceptable user, you may be subjected to restricted access to your character and account.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_025
string.body: Verbal Abuse;Inappropriate speech that may offend others in or out of the game. If you are abusive, you may be subjected to restricted access to your character and account according to the [%dic:STR_DIC_Notes_001].

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_026
string.body: Fraud;Any behaviour that aims at deceiving other customers for personal gain. If you engage in fraud, you may be subjected to restricted access to your account according to the [%dic:STR_DIC_Notes_001].

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_027
string.body: Illegal Programs;All illegal software/hardware that can affect the gameplay and all programs not authorized by the company.

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_028
string.body: Bot Program;All external software and hardware that automatically repeats a specific action infinitely even when additional operation is not made.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDF4Re_Drana_Li_NPC
string.body: Sanctum Expedition Inspector;[%dic:STR_DIC_N_idioma] or [%dic:STR_DIC_N_odde]. These Daevas were dispatched to investigate Balaur Prisoners' disappearances in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_2011_A] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_2021_A].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Q18401
string.body: Esoterrace Researcher;Drakan Researchers at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_idf4re_drana_SZ_Stage_03_2]. These include Esoterrace Investigators, Esoterrace Researchers, Esoterrace Recordkeepers, Esoterrace Anesthetist, and Esoterrace Assistants.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDf4re_Drana_Li
string.body: Esoterrace;The largest Drana producer in Tiamaranta. Passageways from the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_2011_A] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_2021_A] connect to the Esoterrace.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_18403
string.body: Esoterrace Elite;Drakan Soldiers guarding the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_idf4re_drana_SZ_Stage_02_1]. These include Esoterrace Destroyers, Esoterrace Raiders, Esoterrace Hunters, Esoterrace Mages, and Esoterrace Apothecaries.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Q18411
string.body: Esoterrace Labourers;Esoterrace Workers and Esoterrace Gatherers working in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_idf4re_drana_SZ_Stage_01_2].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDF4Re_Drana_Da_NPC
string.body: Pandaemonium Expedition Inspector;An inspector dispatched to the Balaur Fortress in Vorgaltem in order to research the disappearance of Balaur Prisoners. So far, only [%dic:STR_DIC_N_hedele] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_ovirin] have arrived.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDf4re_Drana_Da
string.body: Esoterrace;The largest Drana producer in Tiamaranta. Passageways from the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4_SZ_3011_A] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4_SZ_3021_A] connect to the Esoterrace.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF4Re_Drana_FOBJ_Q18402
string.body: Blighted Dalia Root;These [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF4Re_Dra_01_BionicCPU_53_Ah] roots absorb energy from Elim in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_idf4re_drana_SZ_Stage_01_2].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Q11293
string.body: Padmarashka's Protectors;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Dramata_57_Al]'s Elite Drakan guard unit. They include Naduka Drakan Elite Combat Captains, Naduka Cryptomancers, Naduka Tribunus, and Naduka Greatpriests.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDArena_pvp_L
string.body: Crucible Coliseum;A training arena in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_Arena_L_Lobby]. It consists of the Arenas of Discipline, of Vehemence, of Cooperation and of Glory. To enter the Arena of Glory you need a ticket that you acquire in the Arena of Vehemence as well as in the Arena of Cooperation as a reward.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDArena_pvp_D
string.body: Crucible Coliseum;A training arena in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_Arena_D_Lobby]. It consists of the Arenas of Discipline, of Vehemence, of Cooperation and of Glory. To enter the Arena of Glory you need a ticket that you acquire in the Arena of Vehemence as well as in the Arena of Cooperation as a reward.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDArena_L
string.body: Kaisinel Academy;Win [%dic:STR_DIC_I_COIN_ARENA_01] in the Empyrean Crucible and Crucible Challenge, and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_COIN_ARENA_PVP_01] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDArena_pvp_L].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDArena_D
string.body: Marchutan Priory;Win [%dic:STR_DIC_I_COIN_ARENA_01] in the Empyrean Crucible and Crucible Challenge, and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_COIN_ARENA_PVP_01] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDArena_pvp_D].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Q21292
string.body: Padmarashka Guard;Sentries guarding the entrance to Padmarashka's Nest. They include Padmarashka's Elite Sentinels and Padmarashka's Elite Administrators.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF4B_ItemUseArea_Q10060A
string.body: Magic Ward;The Reians have activated a magic ward near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T1_S8].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T4_Tiamat_Crystal_Named_60_Af
string.body: Petrification Incarnate;An Incarnation of Tiamat who protects the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T4_S6].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF4B_Occupation_Combat
string.body: Siege Warfare;A battle to occupy the four Hearts of Tiamat. At certain times, Tiamat's Incarnations occupy the Hearts. If you defeat the Incarnation, the Heart is yours.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF4B_ItemUseArea_Q20062A
string.body: Magic Ward;The Reians have activated a magic ward near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_S7].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_ldf4a_Owllau_fam
string.body: Urugugu Tribe;A Strigik tribe who settled in the southwest of Sarpan. Due to their history of hard times under Tiamat, they keep to a tough military training system.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_ldf4a_Aurio
string.body: Aurio;A respected and good-looking Strigik, whose star-crossed love is most firmly disapproved by his father.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q11509all
string.body: Strigik Soldiers;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_Fi_57_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_As_57_An], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_Pr_57_An] who live in Urugugu Village.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_KarunProtect
string.body: Kahrun Guard;A defensive legion in Kamar whose loyalty to Kahrun is unwavering.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_Q10050all
string.body: Escaped Dragonbound;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_OP_FanaticFi_Q_56_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_OP_FanaticWi_Q_56_An] who escaped to the Mephitic Caverns.

string.name: STR_DIC_QUEST_18303A
string.body: Char Bombom;An explosive device made from the H Core. Its immense power will surely destroy the New Surkana.

string.name: STR_DIC_QUEST_18306All
string.body: Shulack Soldiers;The [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_01_ShulackPr_58_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_BIDStation_ShulackRa_57_Ae], who remained in the Aturum Sky Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_QUEST_18308All_1
string.body: Soldiers of the Sky Fortress;[plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_02_ShulackKn_58_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_02_ShulackAs_58_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_02_ShulackWi_58_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_IronGolem_58_An] in Aturam Sky Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_QUEST_18309all_1
string.body: Engineering Union Craftsmen;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_ShuLackFI_2_58n]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_ShuLackKN_2_58n]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_ShuLackRA_2_58n]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_ShuLackWI_2_58n]s, and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_ShuLackPR_2_58n]s who manage the power generators.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDStation_recharger
string.body: Recharger;Equipment installed in the Supply Zone of Aturam Sky Fortress. Its original purpose was to charge weapons, but it can also provide energy to living creatures.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Housing_Townhouse
string.body: Studio;The studio located in the Rockroof Village in Arcada State. You can enter through either the Studio Entrance or the Homeward Bound skill.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Housing_Butler
string.body: Butler;Responsible for administrative affairs for all houses. Your butler always stays at home, takes care of house chores, and grants you a gift once per day.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Housing_FurnitureArrangement
string.body: Decorate;When you enter your house, you can click the house-shaped button in the lower half of the screen. In Decorate mode, you can change the location of furniture and other items.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Housing_CrystalOfRelationship
string.body: Relationship Crystal;An installation seen in every house. If you use the crystal, you can teleport to your friend's registered house.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Housing_Pot
string.body: Bloom;A plant that grows its own blessings. If it's well taken care of, it may give you a gift.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_HouseGate
string.body: Homeward Bound;A skill obtained through a skillbook earned when you buy a studio. If you use it, a corridor to your home will open.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Housing_Furniture
string.body: Furniture;The most important element for home decoration. Furniture merchants sell it in the centre of every village, and far more styles are available through crafting.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q11511item
string.body: Sleeping Drug;A sleeping pill that Owllaet asked you to bring. Tell [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Mooluios] first, because Owllaet's request is somewhat suspicious.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q11512_box
string.body: Ornate Box;An ornate box with no obvious value.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q11512_box_1
string.body: Ornate Box;An accessories box beside [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Owlau_LDF4a_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_Sadonix
string.body: Sadonics;A giant Asmodian ship led by Captain Luespaner. The ship is equipped with powerful Aether cannons.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_Q20050all
string.body: Mephitic Klaw;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_OP_Neut_Worker_55_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_OP_Neut_Fly_55_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_OP_Neut_WorkerHigh_55_An], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_OP_Neut_FlyHigh_56_An] burrowing beneath Kamar.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_20051all
string.body: Shulack Search Squad;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_ShulackFi_57_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_ShulackRa_57_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_21509all
string.body: Humnaz Altar;[%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_02], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_06], and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A4_07] that are used by the Humnaz Tribe for rituals.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_sarpan_main
string.body: Sarpan;The Reian Tribe's ancestral land, reclaimed by the Reians from Tiamat's rule after the Cataclysm.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_calydon_fam
string.body: Humnaz Tribe;A Calydon Tribe who settled and flourished in the east of Sarpan.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q21517_ebi
string.body: Hard Evidence;Proof that Calydon attacked refugees. You find the caravan door near Humnaz lands.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q41157all
string.body: Three Refugees;Three missing refugees including [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF4a_Refugee_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF4a_Refugee_02], and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF4a_Refugee_03].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q41177_yohar
string.body: Map Expert;Yohar, who used to be a pirate, may know something about the map.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q41178all
string.body: Urugugu Soldier;Low-ranking soldiers in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A3_03], including [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_Fi_57_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_As_57_An], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Owllau_Pr_57_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q41183all
string.body: Whistlin' Piggies Humnaz Jug Band;A band of elite Humnaz Tribe Soldiers including [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_CalydonPr_57_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_CalydonRa_57_Ae], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_CalydonWi_57_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_aponosFam
string.body: Aponos Tribe;The Brohum Tribe who settled in the west of Sarpan. Their origin and history are unknown.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q41210_1
string.body: Glowing Spirits;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_ElementalLightM_57_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_ElementalLightF_57_An] wandering the Trepone Forest.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_kipros_sheep
string.body: Kypros;A giant ship owned by the Reian Tribe. It has enormous firepower.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_spearofCiel
string.body: Siel's Spear;A legion that has a long history and follows the will of the Empyrean Lords. It consists of the Reian Tribe who are left outside the barrier due to the Cataclysm. Thanks to the legion, the Reian Tribe could successfully settle in the desolation of Balaurea.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q41265all_0

string.name: STR_DIC_E_HousingDF_Event_SantaShugo
string.body: Shugo Delivery Captain;Assistant to the Festival Staff stationed behind [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Harretion] in Pernon. He's dealing with his frustrations over his Lazy Shugo Couriers.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Kebisung_lf

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Kebisung_df

string.name: STR_DIC_E_ZONE_NAME_IDTiamat_Reward

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDTiamat_Reward_DungeonTeleport_In_Down_L
string.body: Treasury Infiltration Passage;A portal leading to the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_ZONE_NAME_IDTiamat_Reward]. It forms inside Tiamaranta's Eye when two or more Hearts are occupied.

string.body: Areas beyond Kahrun's Will;The Naduka Legion Garrison, the Basrasa Legion Garrison, the Satra Legion Garrison, the Stronghold Underground, the Gurriki Grotto,the Gurriki Swamp, Lapialus Mineral Lake, Enos Forest, Blue Quartz Valley, and the Lapialus Mineral Veins. Kahrun's power does not stretch where Tiamat's is strongest.

string.body: Luminaciel Weapons;Powerful weapons as well as sacred symbols that are only entrusted to experienced members of Siel's Spear. They are a sign that Lady Siel is always with you.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_D_LF2a_entrance
string.body: Theobomos Lab;A secret laboratory in Theobomos in Elysea. Asmodians can enter it via a [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_Entrance_D_Teo], formed in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_A_Town].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_L_DF2a_entrance

string.body: Silikor[pl:"Silikors"] of Memory;A Malekor in [%dic:STR_DIC_E_D_LF2a_entrance]. It might possess the research books from the Theobomos Lab.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDTiamat_solo_entrance_L

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Combine_Rookie
string.body: Novice Server;A server where players from different servers can play together and gain additional XP by doing so. Click on the server selection symbol on the lower right-hand side of the screen to go there.

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_02_SZ_All
string.body: Shattered Abyssal Splinter;It was formed when the flow of Aether became unstable due to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_SZ_All] that can be accessed via the Divine Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_02_Boss_Guardian_Light_Fi_60_Al
string.body: Evil Rukril;A magical creature that shares its body with [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_02_Boss_Guardian_Light_Fi_60_Al]. It has become much stronger due to the influence of the Aether.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_02_Boss_Guardian_Dark_Fi_60_Al
string.body: Evil Ebonsoul;A magical creature that shares its body with [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_02_Boss_Guardian_Light_Fi_60_Al]. It has become much stronger due to the influence of the Aether.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_02_Boss_Octaside_Kn_60_Al
string.body: Kaluva;An Arachna in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_02_SZ_All]. She guards her eggs and ensnares everyone that comes close to them in a cocoon.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_02_Boss_TempestElemental_El_60_Al
string.body: Angry Pazuzu;Once a beatiful spirit, he lost control due to influence of the Aether in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_02_SZ_All].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_02_Boss_ElementalkingE_Wi_60_Al
string.body: Yammenes the Mad Guardian;Guards the Artifact of Protection in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_02_SZ_All]. He lost his sanity, which greatly changed his character.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_02_FiNmd_Combine
string.body: Evil Dayshade;An enormous magical creature that protects the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_02_SZ_All]. When threatened, it will split itself up into [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_02_Boss_Guardian_Light_Fi_60_Al] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_02_Boss_Guardian_Dark_Fi_60_Al].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDAbRe_Core_02_ArtifactCore
string.body: Large Aether Pile;A large pile of Aether that appears when you defeat the guardians of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_02_SZ_All].

string.name: STR_DIC_OBJ_IDAbRe_Core_02_Seed
string.body: Orkanimum Fragment of Rage;A piece of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAbRe_Core_02_SilikaCannon_Ra_60_Ah] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDAbRe_Core_02_SZ_All]. Supposedly, this fragment can generate life.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q18030all
string.body: Attacking Soldiers;Drakan of the 43rd Army's Pashid Legion that are attacking in order to capture the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD]. The group consists of a number of assault squads, siege cannons and their commanders and attacks repeatedly. Includes the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Q18030_1], the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Q18030_2], the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Q18030_3] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Q18030_4].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Silverlin
string.body: Silverine Limited;This company works on a variety of projects aimed at improving the quality of life in Katalam. Elyos can join by meeting with [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Lop_Silverlin_Join]. Asmodians can join by meeting with [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Dop_Silverlin_Join].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Greenhat
string.body: Green Hat Alliance;This group advocates the protection of the environment in Katalam. Elyos can join the Green Hat Alliance by meeting with [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Lop_Greenhat_Join]. Asmodians can join the Green Hat Alliance by meeting with [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Dop_Greenhat_Join].

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Pepe_E_01
string.body: Tribune Pepe;Tribune of the Gold Feather Legion, which is part of the Katalam Patrol. He is always very busy with the tasks assigned by Portis. He has subordinates all over Katalam, and can currently be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L] in North Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Portis_E_01
string.body: High Priest Portis;High Priest of the Order of Priests. He controls the Portis Protectorate, which was named after him, and he has followers all over of Katalam. He can be found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_L] in North Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Stelman_E_01
string.body: Senior Tribune Stelman;Senior Tribune of the Katalam Cleanup Squad. Commands the Stelman Protectorate. His subordinates are all over Katalam. He can be found by the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D] in North Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Phone_E_01
string.body: Commander Phon;The commander of the Katalam Cleanup Squad's Red Fang Underground Troop. It is small group, but its members are all over Katalam nevertheless. Phon is currently at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_OP_D] in North Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5_Under_VriTR_Drakan
string.body: Elite Tracking Squad;A unit made up of Tiamat deserters. This troop consists of the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_VriTR_Drakan_Fi_Stun_65_Ae], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_VriTR_Drakan_As_1_Broad_65_Ae], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_VriTR_Drakan_Fi_DD_65_Ae], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_VriTR_Drakan_Wi_Mes_65_Ae], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_VriTR_Drakan_Pr_Heal_65_Ae], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_VriTR_Drakan_Wi_DoT_65_Ae] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_VriTR_Drakan_As_Hide_65_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5_Under_Shadow
string.body: Shadowsouls;Ghosts of the Rune Tribe guarding the crypt. Includes [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_Shadow_65_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_ShadowH_65_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDF5_R1_VriIU_Fi_all
string.body: Head Researcher Notius;The Beritra Head Researcher at the Idgel Storehouse who is hard to find. He is either the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_R1_VriIU_Fi_vsMag_N_65_Ae] or the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_R1_VriIU_Fi_vsPhy_N_65_Ae]. Will flee as soon as he notices an infiltrator. The survivors of the Beritra Army thus have to be eliminated swiftly if there is to be any hope of finding him.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDF5_R1_65_all
string.body: Test Subjects;The following monsters were mutated by the Beritra Army's Idgel experiments: [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_R1_Porguss_65_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_R1_RatmanPatriarch_Fi_65_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_R1_Cherubim4_Fi_65_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_R1_WaterSaam_65_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_R1_Evileye_65_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_R1_VampireQueen_Wi_65_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_R1_NagaMage_Wi_65_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_R1_LizardFiOfficer_Fi_65_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_R1_DevaED_65_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_R1_MimicED_65_n] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_R1_RottenTreeED_65_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDF5_R1_VriCU_65_all
string.body: 43rd Research Troop;The following survivors from the Beritra Army are in the secret room of the Sillus Fortress: [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_R1_VriIU_As_Hi_65_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_R1_VriCU_Fi_65_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_R1_VriCU_Gu_65_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_R1_VriCU_Ba_65_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDF5_R1_VriIU_65_all
string.body: 40th Spy Squad;A Spy Squad of the Beritra Army that can be found in the secret room of the Sillus Fortress. Consists of [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_R1_VriIU_As_65_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_R1_VriIU_Wi_65_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDF5_R1_Vri_all
string.body: Remnant Beritra Army Soldiers;The following soldiers are still in the secret room of the Sillus Fortress: [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_R1_VriIU_As_Hi_65_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_R1_VriCU_Fi_65_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_R1_VriCU_Gu_65_An][plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_R1_VriCU_Ba_65_An][plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_R1_VriIU_As_65_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_R1_VriIU_Wi_65_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_TrDrZombID_all
string.body: Atrocious[pl:"Atrocious"] Undead[pl:"Undead"];Includes the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_TrDrZombID_Fi_65_An] and the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_TrDrZombID_Wi_65_An]. Was probably a Balaur of the Tiamat Legion before turning into an Undead.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_VriTR_N_all
string.body: Tracking Squad;The Beritra Army's 5th Unit. Formerly part of the Tiamat Legion. This troop consists of the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_VriTR_Lizard_Fi_DD_1_65_An], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_VriTR_Lizard_Ra_DoT_1_65_An], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_VriTR_Drakan_As_1_Broad_65_An], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_VriTR_Drakan_Fi_DD_65_An], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_VriTR_Drakan_Wi_DoT_65_An], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_VriTR_Drakan_Pr_Heal_65_An], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_VriTR_Drakan_El_Summon_65_An] and the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_VriTR_Drakan_Fi_Stun_65_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_VrDrZombID_all
string.body: Mutated[pl:"Mutated"] Drakan Soldier[pl:"Soldiers"];[plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_VrDrZombID_Fi_65_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_VrDrZombID_Wi_65_An] used to be Balaur and part of the Beritra Army. Can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_LDF5_SZ_D1].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_TR_N_all
string.body: Soldiers of the Rebuilders Squad;Tiamat deserters wishing to put together a unit of [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_TRLZ1_Ra_65_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_TR_Pr_SN_65_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_TR_El_SN_65_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_TR_Fi_SN_65_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_TRLZ1_Inj_Fi_65_n], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_TRLZ1_Fi_65_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_TR_As1_65_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_TR_Fi_65_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_TR_Wi_65_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_TR_As_SN_65_An] and[plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_TRLZ1_Inj_Ra_65_n] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Under_all].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_G1_Mosbear_all
string.body: Brohum Thieves;Includes the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_G1_Mosbear_Dark_63_An] and the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_G1_Mosbear_solo_Dark_63_An], who can be found on [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_G1].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13053_all
string.body: Supply Plan;This document is divided into individual plans for supplying the soldiers. It is composed of [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_13053a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_13053b] and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_13053c].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Under_all
string.body: Underground of Katalam;The ancient Rune Tribe set up facilities in the underground of Katalam which remained intact after the Tribe's demise. The underground is currently occupied by the Katalam Patrol, the Katalam Cleanup Squad, the Beritra Army, the Tiamat Deserts and Shugos.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_BLDF5_CoffinB_Sum_65_An
string.body: Mad Anubite[pl:"Anubites"];Undead that can be summoned in the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_CoffinB_65_n]. His madness is plain to see.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_BLDF5_CoffinA_Sum_65_An
string.body: Sleepy Anubite[pl:"Anubites"];Undead that can be summoned in the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_CoffinA_65_n]. He looks sleepy.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDLDF5_Under_01_Theano_E_nouse
string.body: Theano;An Elyos agent who is a member of the Zephyr Daevas and part of the infiltration operation at Jormungand's Bridge.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_IDLDF5_Under_01_Rohellein_E_nouse
string.body: Rohellein;An Asmodian agent who is a member of the Nightfall Archons and part of the infiltration operation at Jormungand's Bridge.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U1_VriFlagall
string.body: Balaur Generators;Surkana generators for supporting the guard posts by Jormungand's Bridge. Includes the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U1_VriFlag01_65_e], the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U1_VriFlag02_65_e], the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U1_VriFlag03_65_e] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U1_VriFlag04_65_e].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U1_VriFlag01_65_e_nouse
string.body: Generator[pl:"Generators"] at the Guard Post;A Balaur generator that was installed at the furthest guard post from Jormungand's Bridge. The generator needs to be shut off so that the guard post can be captured and the bridge operation switch used.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U1_VriFlag02_65_e_nouse
string.body: Generator[pl:"Generators"] at the North Post;A Balaur generator that was installed at the northern guard post by Jormungand's Bridge. The generator needs to be shut off so that the guard post can be captured and the bridge operation switch used.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U1_VriFlag03_65_e_nouse
string.body: Generator[pl:"Generators"] at the South Post;A Balaur generator that was installed at the southern guard post by Jormungand's Bridge. The generator needs to be shut off so that the guard post can be captured and the bridge operation switch used.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U1_VriFlag04_65_e_nouse
string.body: Generator[pl:"Generators"] at the Defence Post;A Balaur generator that was installed at the innermost guard post by Jormungand's Bridge. The generator needs to be shut off so that the guard post can be captured and the bridge operation switch can be used.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_quest_13528all
string.body: Three Investigation Reports;Three reports on the Katalam Underground that were compiled by the Beritra Army Reconnaissance Troop. They concern the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_13528a], the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_13528b] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_13528c].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_5011_Killer_Drall
string.body: Dredgion Commander of the Second Unit;The commander of the Beritra Unit attacking the Sillus Fortress. They appear in the fortress if it is conquered by the Elyos or the Asmodians and attack the Guardian General.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_6011_Killer_Drall
string.body: Dredgion Commander of the Third Unit;The commander of the Beritra Unit attacking the Bassen Fortress. They appear in the fortress if it is conquered by the Elyos or the Asmodians and attack the Guardian General.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_6021_Killer_Drall
string.body: Dredgion Commander of the First Unit;The commander of the Beritra Unit attacking the Prades Fortress. They appear in the fortress if it is conquered by the Elyos or the Asmodians and attack the Guardian General.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5a_5011_Killer_DR_1
string.body: Dredgion Commander;One of the commanders of the Second Unit of the 43rd Beritra Army roaming around the Sillus Fortress and attacking the Guardian General.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5a_5011_Killer_DR_2
string.body: Dredgion Commander;One of the commanders of the Second Unit of the 43rd Beritra Army roaming around the Sillus Fortress and attacking the Guardian General.

string.body: Dredgion Commander;One of the commanders of the Third Unit of the 43rd Beritra Army roaming around the Bassen Fortress and attacking the Guardian General.

string.body: Dredgion Commander;One of the commanders of the Third Unit of the 43rd Beritra Army roaming around the Bassen Fortress and attacking the Guardian General.

string.body: Dredgion Commander;One of the commanders of the Third Unit of the 43rd Beritra Army roaming around the Bassen Fortress and attacking the Guardian General.

string.body: Dredgion Commander;One of the commanders of the Third Unit of the 43rd Beritra Army roaming around the Bassen Fortress and attacking the Guardian General.

string.body: Dredgion Commander;One of the commanders of the Third Unit of the 43rd Beritra Army roaming around the Bassen Fortress and attacking the Guardian General.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5b_6021_Killer_DR_1
string.body: Dredgion Commander;One of the commanders of the First Unit of the 43rd Beritra Army roaming around the Prades Fortress and attacking the Guardian General.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5b_6021_Killer_DR_2
string.body: Dredgion Commander;One of the commanders of the First Unit of the 43rd Beritra Army roaming around the Prades Fortress and attacking the Guardian General.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5b_6021_Killer_DR_3
string.body: Dredgion Commander;One of the commanders of the First Unit of the 43rd Beritra Army roaming around the Prades Fortress and attacking the Guardian General.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5b_6021_Killer_DR_4
string.body: Dredgion Commander;One of the commanders of the First Unit of the 43rd Beritra Army roaming around the Prades Fortress and attacking the Guardian General.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5b_6021_Killer_DR_5
string.body: Dredgion Commander;One of the commanders of the First Unit of the 43rd Beritra Army roaming around the Prades Fortress and attacking the Guardian General.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDF5_U1_UltimateSW_N_65_Ae_nouse
string.body: Artillery[pl:"Artillery"];Powerful siege weapon developed by the Beritra Army. It can only be destroyed using the siege tank. This weapon is located near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Under_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDRuneWP_AncientArm_N_65_Al
string.body: Hyperion;An ancient weapon of the Rune Tribe, hidden in Katalamize. It appears in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDRuneweapon].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5RE_solo_idgel
string.body: Idgel Storehouse;A room located inside of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5RE_solo].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDVritra_Base_all
string.body: Sauro War Depot;A base where the Beritra Army stores war materials and weapons. The depot used to belong to the Rune but is now run by Brigade General Sita. It can be accessed via the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_OBJ_IDVritra_Base_Enter].

string.name: STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Under_02_all
string.body: Refuge of the Rune Tribe;The refuge was discovered in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Under_all] and can be entered via the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_OBJ_IDLDF5_Under_02_Entrance_In]. It once served as the grave for high-ranking members of the Rune Tribe and thus hides many valuable ancient relics.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDF5_U2_P_Vri_N_65_all
string.body: Commanders of the Special Research Troop;The High Command of the special research troop sent to obtain the relics containing instructions on the use of Idgel. Includes [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_U2_P_VriIU_Wi_N_65_Ah], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_U2_P_VriRP_Ri_N_65_Ae2] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_U2_P_VriRP_As_N_65_Ae2]. You have to hurry to find them because they appear in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Under_02_all] and disappear as soon as they have retrieved the relics.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDVritra_Base_Drakan_65_Ae_all
string.body: Sauro Elite of the 40th Beritra Army;It consists of the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDVritra_Base_Drakan_Fi_65_Ae2], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDVritra_Base_Drakan_Ri_65_Ae2], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDVritra_Base_Drakan_Wi_65_Ae2], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDVritra_Base_Drakan_As_65_Ae2], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDVritra_Base_Drakan_Gu_65_Ae2], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDVritra_Base_Drakan_Pr_65_Ae2] and the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDVritra_Base_Drakan_Ba_65_Ae2]. These elite soldiers of the 40th Beritra Army are stationed at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDVritra_Base_all].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDLDF5b_TD_Azute_nouse
string.body: Commander Azut of the 43rd Scout Troop;A Drakan commander of the scout troop, attacking the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD] as ordered.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDLDF5b_TD_Zest_nouse
string.body: Commander Zest of the 43rd Scout Troop;A Drakan commander of the scout troop, attacking the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD] as ordered.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDLDF5b_TD_Sartas_nouse
string.body: Commander Sartas of the 43rd Scout Troop;A Drakan commander of the scout troop who is attacking the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD] as ordered.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDLDF5b_TD_Matuke_nouse
string.body: Commander Matuk of the 43rd Assault Squad;A Drakan commander of the assault squad, attacking the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD] as ordered.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDLDF5b_TD_Badute_nouse
string.body: Commander Badut of the 43rd Assault Squad;A Drakan commander of the assault squad, attacking the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD] as ordered.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDLDF5b_TD_Katu_nouse
string.body: Commander Kasutu of the 43rd Assault Squad;A Drakan commander of the assault squad, attacking the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD] as ordered.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDLDF5b_TD_Nirta_nouse
string.body: Commander Nirta of the 43rd Cannoneer Squad;A Drakan commander of the cannoneer squad, attacking the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD] as ordered.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDLDF5b_TD_Murat_nouse
string.body: Commander Murat of the 43rd Cannoneer Squad;A Drakan commander of the cannoneer squad, attacking the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD] as ordered.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDLDF5b_TD_Kaimdu_nouse
string.body: Commander Kaimdu of the 43rd Cannoneer Squad;A Drakan commander of the cannoneer squad, attacking the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD] as ordered.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDF5_TD_Headquater1_N_65_Ah_nouse
string.body: Commander Hakunda;A Drakan commander in charge of the bind points at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDF5_TD_Headquater2_N_65_Ah_nouse
string.body: Commander Lakunda;A Drakan in charge of the bind points at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDLDF5b_TD_Commander_nouse
string.body: Siege Weapon Commander;Drakan commanding the siege weapon of the 43rd Army in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDLDF5b_TD_Artillery_nouse
string.body: Drakan Siege Gunner[pl:"Gunners"];A Drakan who skilfully operates the siege weapon. He poses a major problem to the defence of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDF5_TD_Nor_Fi_N_65_Ae_nouse
string.body: War Officer[pl:"Officers"];A Drakan officer taking part in the attack on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDF5_TD_Nor_Kn_N_65_Ae_nouse
string.body: Guardian Spirit[pl:"Spirits"];A Drakan officer taking part in the invasion of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDF5_TD_Nor_Ra_N_65_Ae_nouse
string.body: Administrator[pl:"Administrators"];A Drakan officer taking part in the attack on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDLDF5b_TD_Boss_nouse
string.body: Pashid;A Beritra Army commander, leading the attack on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD]. He must be eliminated in order to end the conflict.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDLDF5b_TD_SemiBoss_nouse
string.body: Deadly Tariksha;A member of the Reconnaissance Troop of the Beritra Army, taking part in the attack on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD]. She is spying on Supreme Commander Pashid.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDF5_TD_DragonRider_Chief_N_65_Al_nouse
string.body: Supreme Commander Pashid;A Beritra Army commander leading the attack on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD]. He must be eliminated in order to end the conflict.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDF5_TD_Nor_Fi_65_Ae_nouse
string.body: Landing Site Fighter[pl:"Fighters"];A fighter protecting the Beritra Army's landing site near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDF5_TD_Nor_Kn_65_Ae_nouse
string.body: Landing Site Protector[pl:"Protectors"];A protector protecting the Beritra Army's landing site near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDF5_TD_Nor_As_65_Ae_nouse
string.body: Landing Site Ambusher[pl:"Ambushers"];An ambusher protecting the Beritra Army's landing site near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDF5_TD_Nor_As_Hide_65_Ae_nouse
string.body: Landing Site Spy[pl:"Spies"];A spy protecting the Beritra Army's landing site near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U3_Defence_all
string.body: Shield Generators;These devices supply energy to the shields. The Rune Tribe designed them to refine the Idium in the Shield Tower and convert it into energy. These devices include the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U3_Defence_01], the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U3_Defence_02], the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U3_Defence_03] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDF5_U3_Defence_04]. Since their partial destruction, they need to be recharged manually.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_GAb1_Ag_all
string.body: Pangaea Informant[pl:"Informants"];An Informant stationed at the starting point of the Pangaea fortress battle. Depending on where you enter the Pangaea fortress battle, these can be the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_GAb1_01_BelosAg_E], the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_GAb1_02_AspidaAg_E], the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_GAb1_03_AthantosAg_E] or the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_GAb1_04_DysilonAg_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_item_gab_all_title01
string.body: Pangaea Conqueror;You receive this title if you capture a fortress during a fortress battle in Pangaea. This temporary title is required to gain access to Antriksha's Ascension Site.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_title_Q24022
string.body: New Title;The title of 'Tayga Slayer' is bestowed on you if you follow Jorund's advice and kill the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF2_NPC_DireBeastD_Q2034] to become an Artefact Guardian.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Vritramachine
string.body: Invasion Generator[pl:"Generators"];A Beritra Army generator which appears in Kaldor, Akaron and other areas. It seems to open a gateway to another area.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_pangaea_enemy_all
string.body: Enemy[pl:"Enemies"];Forces of an opposing species or faction. In Pangaea, a [%userrace] belonging to another faction is considered an enemy, even if it is from the same species and it looks the same as you.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_KEY_IDLDF4RE01_01

string.body: Junkrunerk;A junk collector who gathers materials required to open the Portal.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF4_Advance_DaChapire
string.body: Asmodian Union;Chapir soldiers who fight on the Asmodian side. They include the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4_Advance_A_DaChapire_Fi_65_An], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4_Advance_A_DaChapire_As_65_An], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4_Advance_A_DaChapire_Pr_65_n] and the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4_Advance_A_DaChapire_Wi_65_n].

They include the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4_Advance_C_LiPopoku_Fi_65_An], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4_Advance_C_LiPopoku_As_65_An], the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4_Advance_C_LiPopoku_Pr_65_An] and the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4_Advance_C_LiPopoku_Wi_65_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_Notes_Shugo_Game
string.body: Shugo Game;In this game you can use [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_I_world_cash_ingame_gacha_coin] to strengthen your weapons. The higher the boost level achieved, the greater the reward.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_B1_B2_B3_all

They all wreak mischief in the centre of Kaldor.

They wreak mischief at important fortress conquest points.

string.body: Material[pl:"Materials"] for the Loyalty Engraving Design;They include [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_65_Deva_D_Arm_Holy_Od_a], the [%dic:STR_DIC_FOBJ_IDLDF5Re_Solo_FOBJ_65_Deva_L_Arm_a], the [%dic:STR_DIC_FOBJ_IDF5_Mini_01_FOBJ_65_Deva_L_Arm_b] and a[%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_65_Deva_L_Arm_Honor_Medal_a]. They are used to make a Loyalty Engraving Design.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_quest_25306_ldf5_fortress_all
string.body: Kaldor Creature[pl:"Creatures"];Monster found on the Burnt Plain and in Anoha Plaza in Kaldor.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_quest_25306_ldf4_advance_all
string.body: Akaron Creature[pl:"Creatures"];Monster found on the Valpurah Plateau in Akaron.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_quest_25306_ab1_all
string.body: Reshanta Creature[pl:"Creatures"];Monster found on the three fortified islands in upper Reshanta.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_quest_25306_dredgion_all
string.body: Battlefield Commander[pl:"Commanders"];They include Governor Varga on the Kamar Battlefield, Captain Abrahn on the Jormungand Marching Route, Kunax in the Runatorium and Supreme Commander Pashid on the Steel Wall Bastion Battlefield.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_quest_25306_instance_all
string.body: Instance Commander[pl:"Commanders"];Refers to Tiamat in Tiamat's Shelter, Hyperion in Katalamize and Supreme Commander Pashid in the Steel Wall Bastion.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_quest_25321_df5_p1_all
string.body: Valley Troublemaker[pl:"Troublemakers"];Monster found in the Aquan Valley in Vengar.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_quest_25321_df5_p2_all
string.body: Deep Sea Troublemaker[pl:"Troublemakers"];Monster found in the Deep Sea in Vengar.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_quest_25321_ldf4_advance_all
string.body: Spring Troublemaker[pl:"Troublemakers"];Monster found at the Akaron Spring.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_quest_25321_ldf5_fortress_all
string.body: Troublemaker[pl:"Troublemakers"] of the Northern Splinter Forest;Monster found in the Northern Splinter Forest in Kaldor.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_quest_25321_ab1_all
string.body: Troublemaker[pl:"Troublemakers"] of the Asteria Fortress;Monster found in the Asteria Fortress in the upper Abyss.

string.name: STR_IDAbRe_Up3_Dkisas_65
string.body: Kysis War Fortress;A hidden Balaur fortress which can be accessed via the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_37]. It is currently occupied by the Ereshkigal Legion. It can only be entered when your allies have captured the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_37].

string.name: STR_IDAbRe_Up3_Crotan_65
string.body: Krotan War Fortress;A hidden Balaur fortress which can be accessed via the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_33]. It is currently occupied by the Ereshkigal Legion. It can only be entered when your allies have captured the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_33].

string.name: STR_IDAbRe_Up3_LaMiren_65
string.body: Miren War Fortress;A hidden Balaur fortress which can be accessed via the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_30]. It is currently occupied by the Ereshkigal Legion. It can only be entered when your allies have captured the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_AB1_30].

They include [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_B1_M_Event], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_B2_M_Event], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_C_M_Event], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_D_M_Event], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_E_M_Event], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_F1_M_Event], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_F2_M_Event], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_G_M_Event], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_H_M_Event] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_I_M_Event].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF6_Lycan
string.body: Elite Black Mane[pl:"Manes"];Black Mane Mau who occupy the area around the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_D] at night. They include the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF6_D_N_Lycan_Fi_68_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF6_D_N_Lycan_As_68_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF6_D_N_Lycan_Ra_68_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF6_D_N_Lycan_Wi_68_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF6_Calydon
string.body: Calyda Elite;Elite Fighters who occupy the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6_SZ_H1] at night. They include the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF6_H_N_Calydon_Fi_68_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF6_H_N_Calydon_As_68_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF6_H_N_Calydon_Wi_68_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF6_H_N_Calydon_Pr_68_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q10520
string.body: Memories Lost;A mission for High Daevas. You can start it with [%dic:STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_10520b], which [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Pernos] sent to you.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q10521
string.body: Memories Regained;A mission for High Daevas. You can start it by talking to the Administrator of the Refuge, [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF6_Ador_E] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q20520
string.body: Memories Lost;A mission for High Daevas. You can start it with [%dic:STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_20520b], which [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Muninn] sent to you.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Q20521
string.body: Memories Regained;A mission for High Daevas. You can start it by talking to the Administrator of the Refuge, [%dic:STR_DIC_N_DF6_Conrto_E] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6].

string.name: STR_DIC_EVENT_Q50052
string.body: Gold Alchemist;An alchemist who assists Daevas with their Ascension. They are Edward on Sanctum Square and Romestan on Pandaemonium Plaza.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDDreadgion_04_DrakanFiNamedA_71_Ae
string.body: Dredgion Navigator[pl:"Navigators"];The navigators of the Ashunatal Dredgion. They include [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDDreadgion_04_DrakanFiNamedAA_71_Ae] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDDreadgion_04_DrakanFiNamedAB_71_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDDreadgion_04_Named_Etc
string.body: Main military forces of the Ashunatal Dredgion;These include the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDDreadgion_04_DrakanWi_Vil_71_Ae], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDDreadgion_04_DrakanFiNamedA_71_Ae] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDDreadgion_04_DrakanRaNamedB_71_Ae] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDDreadgion_04].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_LF6_Mission_Dark_All
string.body: Attack Squad of Darkness;An attack squad that has penetrated into [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF6_Q] through a portal rift. They include [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF6_Mission_Dark_Fi_75_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF6_Mission_Dark_Wi_75_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_DF6_Mission_Dark_All
string.body: Attack Squad of Light;An attack squad that has penetrated into [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDF6_Q] through a portal rift. They include [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF6_Mission_Light_Fi_75_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF6_Mission_Light_Wi_75_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Mahelnu_List_all
string.body: Mahelnu's List[pl:"Lists"];It includes the following names: Greybeard, Little Floel, Stench, Flinch, Melita Poisonthorn, Shadekirrin Lutis, Lab Chief Eirin, Dru and Midas.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Popius_List_all
string.body: Poevius' List[pl:"Lists"];It includes the following names: Lambos, Invisible Vaiper, Miserly Iscraw, Depie the Loner, Furol the Grey, Dishella, Aged Ginseng and Firescar.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Velekanon_List_all
string.body: Belicanon's List[pl:"Lists"];It includes the following names: Petrified Koar, Dark Whisper Shaula, Mate Amatas, Flesheater Chooh and Insightful Panoptes.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Pater_List_all
string.body: Pater's List[pl:"Lists"];It includes the following names: Sentinel Clorint, Chieftain Gudomka, Wanderer Sirotata and Queen Octaku.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Needham_List_all
string.body: Needham's List[pl:"Lists"];It includes the following names: Legas Painwing, Shadow Priest Jungan, Ice Claw Baza, Motherless Ramu, Cynix the Banished, Fearless Doni, Chieftain Tufu, Chieftain Zarchiel, Eto the Living Glacier and Icehorn.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Levinard_List_all
string.body: Levinard's List[pl:"Lists"];It includes the following names: Clever Mahiki, Snowfur Youngling, Soulswallower, Araxia, Huntzner the Brawny, Clever Alfi, Endangered Crasaur, Veribe the Fallen and Steadfast Dalloki.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Landsberg_List_all
string.body: Landsberg's List[pl:"Lists"];It includes the names Thorn Beard Latulatu, Vengeful Narka and Rusty Scale Shalba.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_Lonergan_List_all
string.body: Longergan's List[pl:"Lists"];It includes the following names: Healer Kanar, Chief Mate Devahanson, Elder Kitarpa and Ranger Agueria.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDEternity_02_Hint_A_Boss
string.body: Entry type for the Refuge of Restraint;You can enter by defeating the Gatekeeper of Restraint, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDEternity_02_A_Sam_Ra_Boss1KN_72_Ae], or using the entrance on the 4th Defence Line.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDEternity_02_A_Event_all
string.body: Awakened Protector[pl:"Protectors"];These include Garou, Gabain, Gabir, Garis and Garem.

string.name: STR_DIC_M_IDEternity_02_A_all
string.body: Refuge Protector[pl:"Protectors"];Protectors who watch over the Refuges of the Garden of Knowledge. They include [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDEternity_02_A_Cyclops_02_Fi_70_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDEternity_02_A_Silika_Wi_70_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDEternity_02_A_RollingGolem_Kn_70_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDEternity_02_A_Cyclops_Wi_70_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_STR_IDEternity_02_A_EvilEye_El_70_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDEternity_02_A_S1_Zone_Normal_Fi_70_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDEternity_02_A_S1_Zone_Normal_Ra_70_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDEternity_02_A_S1_Zone_Normal_As_70_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDEternity_02_A_S1_Zone_Normal_Wi_70_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDEternity_02_A_S1_Zone_EvilEye_Fi_70_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDEternity_02_A_Cyclops_Fi_S_72_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDEternity_02_A_Silika_Wi_S_72_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDEternity_02_A_RollingGolem_Kn_S_72_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDEternity_02_A_Cyclops_Wi_S_72_Ae] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDEternity_02_A_EvilEye_El_S_72_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_Highdeva_Manufacture
string.body: Magical Crafting;An ancient crafting method that is as old as Atreia itself. Makes it possible to craft at any location with tools. Click on the button for magical crafting in the Gather/Craft tab under Action/Function or use the key combination Shift+P to open the crafting window.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDTransform_Sado_All
string.body: Guardian[pl:"Guardians"] Of Memory;This includes the Minions of Oblivion and the Shadows of Oblivion that guard the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTransform].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_IDTransform_Drakan_All
string.body: Drakan Special Unit[pl:"Units"];The allied Balaur troops who attacked Atreia and the Tower of Eternity following the peace negotiations. They are a vision of the past and appear at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDTransform].
